meanings.sent1: The thrown ball landed softly on the grass.
meanings.sent2: The thrown toy flew through the air.
meanings.sent3: The thrown pillow hit the wall with a soft thud.
meanings.sent4: The thrown paper airplane soared high above the trees.
meanings.sent5: The thrown dart hit the bullseye perfectly.

meanings.definition: To propel or cast in any way, especially to project or propel from the hand by a sudden forward motion or straightening of the arm and wrist.
meanings.sent1: She thrown the ball to her friend with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: He thrown the frisbee to the dog at the park.
meanings.sent3: The magician thrown the cards into the audience, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The chef thrown the pizza dough high in the air before catching it skillfully.
meanings.sent5: The quarterback thrown a perfect pass to the receiver for a touchdown.
